name: Puzzle Bang Bang
overview:
Puzzle Bang Bang is an arcade puzzle game by Omega System in 1999.

Lup Lup Puzzle is essentially the same game as Puzzle Bang Bang. The only major differences are in the service screen options. Puzzle Bang Bang was strictly a Korean game and did not have any nude images. Lup Lup Puzzle comes in English and Japanese and features the option to include nude images. Also, the pictures & No Nude Girls option features a heavier rotation of Asian Bikini models. The nude options feature a decent mix of Asian and European nudes.
